DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of multiple ascending doses of PF-04802540 administered orally to healthy adult subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Safety Study of PF-04802540 in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males or females of nonchildbearing capacity aged 21 to 55 years inclusive at screening. Body mass index in the range of 18 to 30 kg/m2 and body weight>45 kg. Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of screening evaluation. Use of prescription or nonprescription drugs Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption
